messages.message: Starting off with some solid Ore and Wheat at Node 42. Good luck, everyone!
Going to point my road toward the brick at Node 41. I'm definitely going to need some building materials to go with all this wheat!
Nice start, Alice! That's a lot of Wheat down there. I think I'll settle into this nice Brick and Sheep spot at Node 20 to keep the resource distribution interesting. Good luck, Charlie!
I'm placing my road from Node 20 to Node 10. This path keeps me close to the center while moving towards that 3:1 port at Node 9. Good luck with your first placement, Charlie!

Hey Alice and Bob! Solid starts. Alice, that's some serious Wheat production. Bob, nice central positioning. I think I'll grab this spot at Node 12. It looks like a good place to start my network. Good luck to everyone!
I'm placing my road from Node 12 to Node 13. It seems like a natural path for expansion towards some wheat. Good luck with your second placements!
